akn:section.akn:heading: Denial of applications; finality of decision

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 1220c. Denial of applications; finality of decision A decision by the Secretary denying any application for a 11 So in original. Probably should be “an”. obsolete ship under this chapter is final. (Pub. L. 92–402, § 6, Aug. 22, 1972, 86 Stat. 618; Pub. L. 98–623, title II, § 207(1), Nov. 8, 1984, 98 Stat. 3397.)
Editorial Notes Amendments1984—Pub. L. 98–623 substituted “obsolete ship” for “Liberty ship”.
